name: wp-hotelier-wpml
description: Integrate WPML with Easy WP Hotelier.
author: Benito Lopez http://lopezb.com/

scripts.run:pot: rm -rf dist; wp-pot --src '**/*.php' --dest-file languages/wp-hotelier-wpml.pot --domain wp-hotelier-wpml --package 'Easy WP Hotelier Multilingual' --bug-report https://wphotelier.com --team 'Easy WP Hotelier <support@wphotelier.com>'
scripts.zip: rsync -azP -e --delete --exclude='package.json' --exclude='.*/' --exclude='.*' --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='dist/' . dist/wp-hotelier-wpml; cd dist; zip -r wp-hotelier-wpml.$npm_package_version.zip wp-hotelier-wpml; cd ..
scripts.build-sync: npm run dirs -s; npm-run-all --silent --parallel build:* sync
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist; mkdir -p dist/wp-hotelier-wpml; npm run zip -s
